channel.title: Projects on Urban Rigger
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Urban Rigger

item.title: COPENHAGEN
item.description: ‘Project Copenhagen‘ We figured Copenhagen would be the best place to place our first Urban Rigger. After having succesfully launched our first Urban Rigger 1.0, we’ve gotten green light to place another five Urban Riggers in the spring of 2019.

item.title: GOTHENBORG
item.description: ‘Project Gothenborg‘ The next big move for Urban Rigger is the project in Gothenborg. The University of Gothenborg and the Commune of Gothenborg, has finansed this project. This will hopefully launch in the spring/summer of 2020. This is so far our biggest project. A total of 432 recycled containers will be used for this Urban Rigger city.

item.title: NEW YORK
item.description: ‘Project New York City‘ Our first project so far outside Europe. New York City is the heart of students in the states, and therefore they are also in need of studenthousing. We’re hoping to begin this as soon as the state approves. These Urban Riggers will be placed on the harbor side of New York City.

item.title: PARIS
item.description: ‘Project Paris‘ We’re currently working on a small project in Paris. This is the University of Paris wanting a set of containers for their internation students. This will hopefully launch in the spring/summer of 2020. Speaking of France, the City of Nice is currently doing enviromental research of placing a big amount of Urban Rigger in their harbour.
